name: Raimo
description:
Raimo is a copy machines lid's manager (really important job) and he is late from work. In the game you help him to get to work before time runs out!

Controls:

A - move left

B - move right

space - jump

shift - slide

Credits:

Coding: Tatu Katajisto

Graphics: S. Hietaoja

Audio, marketing and production: KennaJana
